section.p: Contains the Accessory that is required or used by a surgical device.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] accessoryUsed with data type Code
Identifies the accessory being used for a surgical device.

Contains zero or more [0..*] accessory, where its type is Surgery Device
An accessory that has a secondary, supplementary, or subordinate function to the surgical device.

Contains exactly one [1..1] accessoryUsed with data type Code
Identifies the accessory being used for a surgical device.

Contains zero or more [0..*] accessory, where its type is Surgery Device
An accessory that has a secondary, supplementary, or subordinate function to the surgical device.
